description: A lightly seasoned and creamy textured soup has a delightful crunch and saltiness with the addition of the bacon.
name: Pea & Broad Bean Soup with Crispy Bacon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped
1 stalk celery, leaves removed and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pan to a medium heat with the oil and fry the bacon for 4 minutes turning halfway and then remove from the pan. Add the butter, chopped onion, celery, and garlic to the pan and fry for 6 minutes while mixing.
Add the rest of the ingredients, lower the heat and allow to simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and using a hand blender, blend to a smooth consistency.
Serve with the chopped bacon, a choice of garnish and breads if desired.
